movie_title: Meet the tardigrade, the toughest animal on Earth - Thomas Boothby

vocabulary.definition: able to withstand or recover quickly from difficult conditions
vocabulary.example: Despite facing many challenges, the community proved to be resilient and bounced back stronger.

vocabulary.definition: the chemical processes that occur within a living organism in order to maintain life
vocabulary.example: Regular exercise can help boost metabolism and aid in weight loss.

vocabulary.definition: a state of suspended animation or extreme desiccation, allowing an organism to survive without water
vocabulary.example: The tardigrade's ability to enter anhydrobiosis enables it to survive in harsh conditions.

vocabulary.definition: the forming of a theory or conjecture without firm evidence
vocabulary.example: There is much speculation about the possible outcomes of the upcoming election.

vocabulary.definition: of or from outside the Earth or its atmosphere
vocabulary.example: Scientists are exploring the possibility of finding extraterrestrial life forms in other galaxies.

vocabulary.definition: large naturally occurring communities of flora and fauna occupying a major habitat
vocabulary.example: The rainforest is one of the most diverse biomes on Earth, home to numerous species of plants and animals.
